item.title: Custom error page in Traefik v2.x. Finally 😻
item.description: What you will learn today 🦦: what is Traefik and why I decisively recommend to use it with Docker Swarm how to show custom error page if Traefik returns 404 (service not found) How I met Traefik 😁 Traefik is a top modern reverse proxy and load balancer. I started to use it from major version 1. At that moment, I already had Docker Swarm cluster, which I began to prepare for production use, and only one thing in the coherent picture has been left: “External Load Balancer”.

item.title: XDebug for PHP docker container on macOS
item.description: Into 💆 Pre-conditions: macOS Sierra Docker CE Version 17.06.2-ce-mac27 PHP 7.1.8 XDebug v2.5.0 PhpStorm 2017.2 If you want to set up remote debug from your container you have 2 options: xdebug.remote_host = %host_ip% %host_ip% — The IP of the machine running your IDE. It’s assumed on the same host as Docker. xdebug.remote_connect_back = on checks $_SERVER[‘HTTP_X_FORWARDED_FOR’] and $_SERVER[‘REMOTE_ADDR’] variables to find out which IP address to use. You cannot use xdebug.
